page.title: 04Shopping survey in Beverley
page.content: We went to the shops to conduct a shopping survey for one day. Most people said, "Once a day" to the question, "How often do you use these shops?" One person said twice a day. Then we asked them how long they had lived in the area. It seemed quite a settled area, because out of fifty people interviewed only one person had lived there for under five years. Five people had lived there for over fifty years. Then we asked people why they used the shops? Most people said they were convenient. Nearly everyone said that they liked shopping there. We asked them how often they visited the market and most people said every week. Just about everyone said the prices were a bit expensive. Not many people said that they wanted to see more shops in the area.
